WRITING.TEXT: Maybe that's where he was stationed, but he (like myself, and many, many proud US soldiers) proudly picked his future wife from among the youthful specimens at WJHS (now WAMS). Once he selected Pricilla to be his bottom bitch, he grabbed his rifle and kept the darkness at bay while his concubine safely grew into puberty. Wiesbaden has never felt safer.
Elvis used to stand guard over the city in the days before I kept watch.

Great comparison.
All that "cinematic" filler in the PCE version... Was that made from scratch for this release?
I played Golden Axe a bunch in the arcades, and recall it's presentation as very similar to the Genesis release. This was in the US though (a few EU cabinets too).
Gameplay on PCE makes the Megadrive port look fucking incredible.
Damn. M.M. That's the finest pizza I've seen dropped on this sub. Fuck and Yes.

I joined so that I could comment on how shitty this show is 3/4ths of the time, and stuck around so that I could save dear souls from wasting their precious time.
Seriously, this show sucks dick. Not well, either. With a dry unwilling mouth. Kinda like fucking a loofah.

Man, this show sucks.
It's got one acceptable episode out of every three to four.
I watched from beginning to end during original airdates, and cringed most of the time. The last season was the worst. Shitty show. Shitty, shitty fucking show.

Try looking in the vicinity of 55.3781 N, 3.4360 W. You'll find the vast majority of them there.
Milky tube. Big one. ;)

I like some of the details here.
The latticed exoskeleton. No "bones" were evident any time we saw an android decapitated or bisected in previous flicks. Just skin and a bunch of milky tubes. The thin frame seen here is a great looking support structure.
Also, the acrylic face looks like what we saw when the Nostromo crew torched Ash and his skin melted off.
Good stuff.
Bombshell is among G1's finest.
Felicia Hardy

I've let the Engineers look grow on me, but this is so much better. Looks a bunch more like that decomposing mess Dallas found hunched over in its chair. Also looks way more "alien" and less "guy with an elephant mask".
This thing is hype.

Dudes an underwear model. Acts as well as any mannequin. Pretty face, shit else.
Like that guy in Avatar, and that dude who played John Connor in the second to last Terminator flick.
Fair enough to look at. One mode (bored). No charisma.
Shitty excuse for an "actor".

Ain't gonna happen. You might get yourself some headphones and Bluetooth your tubes of choice from your pocket. This town doesn't mess with that "devil music".

I predict his tagalong flu Virus will be the catalyst that spreads the Alien infection, and that David will attempt to counter it's effects by splicing Francos flu with praying mantis dna and spraying it all over everybody, only to watch the crew turn into mantis creatures with a boner for Mor... I mean Kenny Powers. Taking DNA from several sources, including cactus, golden retriever, shark, and dinosaur, David creates a third airborne virus that results in turning the remaining crew into disfigured, humanoid blobs that the android dubs "Cronenbergs." The planet is soon overrun with these disfigured monsters, so David steals Kenny Powers away to another world to begin anew...
One can never have too many.

People might describe a movies emotional peaks like a punch in the stomach. When I talk about this movie, I'll describe those moments like a kick from Steve Rogers.

Changed my mindset on non-animated musical films.
